fields.description:
Hello ,

i face an issue with the i18n , where i can't create files (auto removed after build)
i find inside the i18n folder a file  alloy_generated with this text

This directory is generated from the "/app/i18n" and "/app/theme/<name>/i18n" directories.

Do not modify any files in this directory. Your changes will be lost on next build.

Please make sure "/i18n" is added to your version control's ignore list (i.e. .gitignore).

Thank's in advance .

comments.body:
Hello,
Thanks for your query.
Starting with Alloy 1.8 the location of your {{/i18n}} and {{/platform}} source directories for Alloy has changed. These used to live in your project root, just like they do for classic Titanium projects. They are now expected to be at {{/app/i18n}} and {{/app/platform}}.

When you build your app, Alloy will generate the root /i18n and /platform directories, just like it generates the /Resources directory. Any manual change to files in these directories will be lost during the next build.

[Blog Link|http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2016/03/alloy-1-8-relocates-i18n-and-platform-directories/]

Thanks
